p: Table 6 shows the effects of RC supplementation on the serum biochemistry of the hens at 12 weeks. There was no significant difference in serum biochemistry between all treatment groups and the control. Table 7 shows the effects of RC supplementation on the serum antioxidant enzyme activity in the hens at 12 weeks. Compared to the control, hens that received RC supplementation expressed higher SOD activity ( P<0.1). However, there was no significant difference in CAT activity among any of the groups.
